channel.title: Anagrams on Hashnopolis
channel.description: Recent content in Anagrams on Hashnopolis

item.title: Group Anagrams
item.description: Given an array of strings, group anagrams together. Example Input: ["eat", "tea", "tan", "ate", "nat", "bat"], Output: [ ["ate","eat","tea"], ["nat","tan"], ["bat"] ] Note All inputs will be in lowercase. The order of your output does not matter. Solution class Solution(object): def groupAnagrams(self, strs): """ :type strs: List[str] :rtype: List[List[str]] """ primeNums = { "a": 2, "b": 3, "c": 5, "d": 7, "e": 11, "f": 13, "g": 17, "h": 19, "i": 23, "j": 29, "k": 31, "m": 37, "l": 41, "n": 43, "o": 47, "p": 53, "q": 59, "r": 61, "s": 67, "t": 71, "u": 73, "v": 79, "w": 83, "x": 89, "y": 97, "z": 101 } def encode(string): res = 1 for s in list(string): res *= primeNums[s] return res anagrams = {} for string in strs: code = encode(string) if anagrams.
